channel.title: Test Podcast - Author Format Demonstration
channel.description: A test podcast demonstrating various author field formats that are now supported

item.title: Episode 1: Simple String Author
item.description: This episode has a simple string author field - the original format that always worked.
item.author: John Doe

item.title: Episode 2: Email Format Author
item.description: This episode demonstrates the email (name) format that RSS feeds sometimes use.
item.author: podcast@example.com (Jane Smith)

item.title: Episode 3: Email Only Author
item.description: This episode has just an email address as the author field.
item.author: anonymous@example.com

item.title: Episode 4: Dublin Core Creator
item.description: This episode uses the Dublin Core creator field instead of author.
item.dc:creator: Dr. Robert Wilson

item.title: Episode 5: Complex Author Information
item.description: This episode has complex author information that would have caused issues before the fix.
item.author: chief.editor@techpodcast.com (Dr. Sarah Johnson-Smith)
